cont.entity_b: Sleek and compact design, suitable for bathrooms.

cont.entity_a: The fan is louder than advertised, rated at approximately 2 sones. Vibrates significantly, affecting attic joists. Some units are quieter than others.
cont.entity_b: Noise level higher than expected for fan and heater functions.

cont.entity_a: Installation is straightforward, but the mounting mechanism is problematic. Requires larger holes for installation in existing structures. Easy to install if replacing similar models.
cont.entity_b: Installation is difficult for existing structures, better suited for new constructions. Difficult to install due to mounting bracket design.

Performance.comm: Performs well in clearing odors and steam.

cont.entity_a: Effective in reducing condensation. Good air movement with a 4-inch exhaust tube. The fan is powerful but noisy.
cont.entity_b: Good performance for heat and fan functions.

cont.entity_a: Inconsistent quality control, with some units having bent brackets.
cont.entity_b: Heater unit may cause melting and potential fire hazard.

cont.entity_a: Good value for price but lacks installation instructions clarity.
cont.entity_b: Significant savings when purchased online compared to local stores. Unit is economical but noisy.
Heaters have a tendency to burn out quickly. Long-lasting with easy part replacements.
Replacement parts fit well with older models.
Wiring instructions are inadequate for non-professionals.
